txt.en: As the War of the Ring drew to a close, the dwarves of the Lonely Mountain defied the armies of Sauron. DÃ¡in Ironfoot, the King under the Mountain, fell before the gates of Erebor and his son Thorin III succeeded to the throne. Swear your allegiance to Durin's Folk, and you will aid the new King under the Mountain as he seeks to ensure their place in Middle-earth.\n\nContact: Dori can be found at Cirith Gorgor, just inside the ruins of the Black Gate.
